Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.name: Pepper Bacterial Spot
remedies: Apply copper-based fungicides immediately.
Remove and destroy infected leaves/plants.

Pepper__bell___healthy.name: Healthy Bell Pepper
remedies: No treatment needed! Your plant looks great.
Continue regular watering.

Potato___Early_blight.name: Potato Early Blight
remedies: Prune infected leaves to stop spread.
Apply fungicides containing Mancozeb or Chlorothalonil.
precautions: Avoid overhead watering to keep foliage dry.
Mulch soil to prevent fungal spores from splashing.

Potato___healthy.name: Healthy Potato
remedies: No treatment needed.
Maintain consistent soil moisture.
precautions: Hill soil around the base of the plant.

Potato___Late_blight.name: Potato Late Blight
remedies: This is highly contagious. Remove infected plants immediately.
Apply fungicides if caught very early.
precautions: Monitor weather; cool and wet conditions favor blight.

Tomato__Target_Spot.name: Tomato Target Spot
remedies: Improve air circulation by pruning.
Apply fungicides specifically for target spot.
precautions: Remove crop debris at the end of the season.

Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.name: Tomato Mosaic Virus
remedies: There is no cure. Remove and burn the plant.
Sanitize all tools (virus spreads via touch).
precautions: Wash hands thoroughly before handling plants.
Control weeds that may host the virus.

Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.name: Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus
remedies: Remove infected plants to protect neighbors.
Control whiteflies (the carriers) with neem oil or traps.

Tomato_Bacterial_spot.name: Tomato Bacterial Spot
remedies: Apply a copper-based bactericide.
Avoid handling wet plants.
precautions: Use drip irrigation instead of sprinklers.

Tomato_Early_blight.name: Tomato Early Blight
remedies: Remove lower infected leaves.
Treat with bio-fungicides or copper spray.
precautions: Stake plants to keep leaves off the ground.
Mulch around the base of the plant.

Tomato_healthy.name: Healthy Tomato
remedies: Your plant is thriving! Keep it up.
Ensure it gets plenty of sunlight.

Tomato_Late_blight.name: Tomato Late Blight
remedies: Remove and bag infected plants immediately.
Do not compost infected material.
precautions: Space plants widely for maximum airflow.

Tomato_Leaf_Mold.name: Tomato Leaf Mold
remedies: Increase ventilation immediately.
Apply fungicide if severe.
precautions: Water early in the day so leaves dry out.

Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.name: Septoria Leaf Spot
remedies: Remove leaves with spots.
Apply chlorothalonil or copper fungicides.
precautions: Clean up all fallen leaves in autumn.

Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.name: Two-Spotted Spider Mite
remedies: Spray with water jet to dislodge mites.
Use insecticidal soap or neem oil.

Background_Noise.name: Unknown / Not a Leaf
remedies: Please upload a clear photo of a crop leaf.
precautions: Ensure the leaf is in focus and well-lit.
